info.name: Dark Twitter Customizable
info.description:
**Unmaintained, welcome to clone it and maintain one**


This style is based on Jimmie1717's dark twitter.

Please set your font color theme through Your Profile -> Edit profile -> Theme color. If you want to remove image preview function, I recommend this style https://userstyles.org/styles/114445/theme For Tweetdesk users, you can use this one https://userstyles.org/styles/124713/tweetdesk-hide-media

Other people may set a dark font theme, if you want to overwrite their settings, you can add this style: https://userstyles.org/styles/120452/overwrite-twitter-theme-color

If you like a background image, you can add this style https://userstyles.org/styles/134044/twitter-background-image
